Department Overview

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” text_orientation=”justified” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_padding=”||5px||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”12px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_line_height_tablet=”” text_line_height_phone=”1.5em” text_line_height_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

The department of management was launched his long & glorious journey in 1975. Its situated southern side of main building.in every corner such as debate, football, cricket, volleyball, cultural program, social work the student of management perform unparalleled. The mission and vision of the department of management is to develop skilled human resources in competitive digital business world with specialized education. The teachers are committed to make up student honest and sincerity with their integrity.
